My Ramen

  • Client

    side project

  • Role

    Website, Front-End Developer

  • Sector

    Restaurant

My Ramen is a restaurant website I developed in order to hone my UI design skills. I chose ramen because not only is it delicious but there's a large reserve of quality ramen photos on Pexels and Unsplash. I was heavily inspired by Hamada Tea and therefore Kyoto culture. I wanted the design to be subtle and soft.

COLOR

Lavendar accompanied by shades of white were chosen to express serenity unique to Kyoto culture. The light contrast was utilized to put emphasis on the restaurant food.

#433d3d

rgb(230,237,240)

#e6edf0

#ffffff

Website

My main focus was on easy functionality and clean design that responds well on large and small devices.
